text: @GregAbbott_TX Wearing a mask is such a small ask by those with auto immune disease, diabetes, and other complicating factors that to not wear one is at best, disrespectful. Legal or not, its straight up selfish. I guess the right to wear a mask is more important than Christan values. #COVID19
